title: Honor icon
body: The honor icons had a deadline of being distributed yesterday right? I never got any and I know I at least got the green ribbon once.

replies.body: I went ahead and double-checked this account and it *does* look like you got the Honor for All icon added to your account. Make sure to check through your icons for it.
Is that the honor icon everyone got for getting 10 honors? I got that but never anything for the ribbon I had b4.
Those icons were based on the ribbons you got. Sounds like you found it!
